author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Modernise the interface of `ObjectWithDict`:
  - move trivial methods into the class definition;
  - rewrite accessors to return by (const) reference instead of by value.

Note: this PR includes #47438, which can be removed once that is merged.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backported of #47442 to 15.0.x as part of the MPI work.
title: Modernise the interface of `ObjectWithDict` [15.0.x]
